purpose: To facilitate seamless communication between intelligent agents, enabling them to collaborate effectively in diverse environments.
principle: The protocol is designed to be open and extensible, allowing for the integration of various agent types and communication methods while ensuring security and efficiency.
reusability: The protocol promotes reusability by providing a standardized framework that can be adapted for various agent applications and use cases.
limitations: As an experimental protocol in alpha status, it may lack comprehensive documentation and support for all potential agent interactions, and performance may vary across different implementations.
name: AgentNetworkProtocol
description: AgentNetworkProtocol(ANP) is an open source protocol for agent communication. Our vision is to define how agents connect with each other, building an open, secure, and efficient collaboration network for billions of intelligent agents.
